name: Cat Meowta Here
description:
A game made up of tiny fast-paced games inspired by the daily lives of cats... my cats mostly.

Play as Mico and Leia as they try to wreck the house and have some fun while their owners are away!

Instructions:

The game mostly uses mouse and keyboard inputs, keyboard inputs require frenetic taps (otherwise it'd be too easy!).

NOTE: This game is current under development on my spare time. Feedback is appreciated! This project is open source and can be found on GitHub.
